    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    Facet DirectBill_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:DirectBill_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<DirectBill xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" billingAccount="00034723" directBill_ID="7654" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <ota2-0400:CompanySummary objID="company_1">
        <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
        <ota2-0400:CompanyRef>company_1</ota2-0400:CompanyRef>
        <ota2-0400:Name code="AI" codeContext="Example String Value" department="Adventure department" description="Example String Value" division="Travel Division" shortName="Adventure Inc">Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated</ota2-0400:Name>
        <ota2-0400:AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true">
            <ota2-0400:AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</ota2-0400:AddressLine>
            <ota2-0400:BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</ota2-0400:BldgRoom>
            <ota2-0400:Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</ota2-0400:Number>
            <ota2-0400:Street>Travers Street</ota2-0400:Street>
            <ota2-0400:City>Dublin</ota2-0400:City>
            <ota2-0400:County>Fairfax</ota2-0400:County>
            <ota2-0400:StateProv name="Texas">TX</ota2-0400:StateProv>
            <ota2-0400:Country name="Ireland">IR</ota2-0400:Country>
            <ota2-0400:PostalCode>32165-9999</ota2-0400:PostalCode>
            <ota2-0400:Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</ota2-0400:Remark>
            <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
            <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
            <ota2-0400:Use>Billing</ota2-0400:Use>
        </ota2-0400:AddressDetail>
        <ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_1" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Home">
            <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="Unknown" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="No" shareSyncInd="Inherit"/>
            <ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>Brand reservations office</ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>
            <ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>Voice</ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>
            <ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>Contact</ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>
        </ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail>
        <ota2-0400:Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
            <ota2-0400:Address>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Address>
            <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
            <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
        </ota2-0400:Email>
        <ota2-0400:URL defaultInd="true" type="Example String Value">http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</ota2-0400:URL>
    </ota2-0400:CompanySummary>
</DirectBill>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Privacy
        Allows for control of the sharing of direct bill data between parties.
        Details
        Type Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        CompanySummary
        Company to which remittance should be sent.
        Details
        Type Company_Summary
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        directBill_ID
        Identifier for the organization to be billed directly for travel services.
        Details
        Type String
        Example Value 7654
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        billingAccount
        The account assigned by the subscriber for billing reconciliation of a corporate account.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value 00034723
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
